mainEntity.name: Where can I find more information about Pudgy Penguins?

acceptedAnswer.text: You can find more information about Pudgy Penguins by visiting their official Twitter page at https://twitter.com/pudgypenguins or their website at https://pudgypenguins.com.

mainEntity.name: How can I learn more about Arbitrum?

acceptedAnswer.text: To learn more about Arbitrum, you can visit their official website at https://offchainlabs.com or their Twitter page at https://twitter.com/arbitrum.
